Package org.example.View

Class SimulatorView

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
org.example.View.SimulatorView
public class SimulatorView extends javafx.application.Application
JavaFX-based graphical user interface for the bank simulation system. Provides interactive controls and real-time visualization of the simulation.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Initializes and configures the main simulation interface. Sets up control panels, visualization canvas, and statistics display.
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application
      Parameters:
      stage - The primary stage for the application

    • showSimulationComplete

      public void showSimulationComplete()
      Handles the completion of a simulation run. Updates UI elements to reflect completion state.

    • showSimulationReset

      public void showSimulationReset()
      Resets the simulation interface to its initial state. Enables controls and clears statistics.

    • updateStatistics

      public void updateStatistics(String stats)
      Updates the simulation statistics panel with new results. Displays detailed metrics about the simulation run.
      Parameters:
      stats - Formatted string containing simulation statistics

    • setSimulationStatus

      public void setSimulationStatus(String status)
      Updates the simulation status label.
      Parameters:
      status - New status message to display

    • isSimulationComplete

      public boolean isSimulationComplete()
      Checks if the simulation has completed.
      Returns:
      true if simulation is complete, false otherwise

    • updateQueueVisualization

      public void updateQueueVisualization(Map<String,List<Customer>> queueStatus)
      Updates the visual representation of customer queues. Draws customers in their respective queues with appropriate icons.
      Parameters:
      queueStatus - Current status of all queues in the simulation

    • updatePauseButton

      public void updatePauseButton(boolean isPaused)
      Updates the pause button text and state.
      Parameters:
      isPaused - true to show "Resume", false to show "Pause"

    • updateStatusArea

      public void updateStatusArea(int totalCustomers)
      Updates the status display area with current customer count.
      Parameters:
      totalCustomers - Total number of customers served

    • updateResultsHistory

      public void updateResultsHistory()
      Updates the historical results dropdown with past simulation runs. Maintains the current selection if still available.
